verbs.description: To [V: see] [ARG1: if Melania Trump really has hostile feelings for our nation 's leader] , [ARG0: Stephen Colbert] interviewed " the first lady " ( Laura Benanti ) .

[ARGM-PRP: To see if Melania Trump really has hostile feelings for our nation 's leader] , [ARG0: Stephen Colbert] [V: interviewed] " [ARG1: the first lady " ( Laura Benanti )] .
